item.title: CVE-2018-15640|2024-09-16T22:02:03.889Z -- odoo -- odoo%20enterprise
item.description: Improper access control in the Helpdesk App of Odoo Enterprise 10.0 through 12.0 allows remote authenticated attackers to obtain elevated privileges via a crafted request.
